Third party software:

cmake:
  http://www.cmake.org/
  wget http://www.cmake.org/files/v2.8/cmake-2.8.7.tar.gz

Bamtools:
  https://github.com/pezmaster31/bamtools

Tabix:
  https://github.com/ekg/tabixpp

SNP-o-matic:
  http://snpomatic.sourceforge.net/
  http://sourceforge.net/scm/?type=svn&group_id=256020
  svn co https://snpomatic.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/snpomatic

gnuplot:
  http://sourceforge.net/projects/gnuplot/files/

samtools:
  http://sourceforge.net/projects/samtools/files/

SMALT:
  http://www.sanger.ac.uk/resources/software/smalt/
